segments.text: I just bought a new atlas . I ’ m looking this map of the world . Look at Russia ! That ’ s a vast country .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Canada , china , and the use are huge too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are several tiny countries in the world too . Countries like Monaco are smaller than many cities .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Those small countries are microscopic compared to Russia . European countries are relatively small . France looks quite big in Europe , but compared to many countries in other continents , it ’ s not very l
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Britain is half the size of france , but great Britain is still one of the largest islands in the world .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The thing with large countries is that often they have vast areas of land that are useless or hardly used . Russia and Canada have enormous areas of ice and forest .
segments.speaker: S1
